results.name: Triangle by rows, number of leading 1's in Fibonacci Maximal notation.
comment: A181630 = number of 1's in Fibonacci Maximal notation (which has headings of
(...8, 5, 3, 2, 1) filling entries from the right to left; as opposed to
Fibonacci Minimal which starts from the left. For example, 8 in Maximal =
formula: Number of leading 1's in Fibonacci Maximal notation, for n.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
Example: a(14) 1 since 14 in Fibonacci Maximal = 10111.
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Nov 02 2010
